content: using a 7 inch square potholder the total length of the potholder towel is about 14 inches long depending on the cotton yarn length of the crocheted towel portion can vary from 9 75 to 10 5 long i also crocheted this using big twist cotton in a 131 yard 2 65 ounce skein the outcome was still an overall length of 14 inches long but with 26 row i had just a small amount of yarn leftover
